languages.text: "Преподобный Адальберт, благословите нас на праведную битву".
"Confessor Adalbert, I ask for your blessing before a righteous battle."
languages.original_text: "Преподобный Адальберт, благословите нас на праведную битву".

traits.locale_text: "Reverend Adalbert, I ask for your blessing before a righteous battle."
"Reverend Adalbert, I ask for your blessing before a righteous battle."
"Reverend Adalbert, I ask for your blessing before a righteous battle."
"Reverend Adalbert, I ask for your blessing before a righteous battle."
"Confessor Adalbert, I ask for your blessing before a righteous battle."
"Confessor Adalbert, I ask for your blessing before a righteous battle."

languages.text: « Confesseur Adalbert, nous accorderez-vous votre bénédiction pour le combat à venir ? »
languages.original_text: "Confessor Adalbert, I ask for your blessing before a righteous battle."

traits.locale_text: « Révérend Adalbert, nous accorderez-vous votre bénédiction pour le combat à venir ? »

languages.text: «Confesor Adalbert, solicito su bendición antes de esta batalla justa».
languages.original_text: "Confessor Adalbert, I ask for your blessing before a righteous battle."

traits.locale_text: «Reverendo Adalbert, solicito su bendición antes de esta batalla justa».

languages.text: “在这场正义之战开始之前，我请求得到你的祝福，告解神父阿达伯特。”
languages.original_text: "Confessor Adalbert, I ask for your blessing before a righteous battle."

traits.locale_text: “在这场正义之战开始之前，我请求得到你的祝福，阿达伯特牧师。”

languages.text: 「アダルバート牧師、正義の戦いの前に祝福をお願いします」「聴罪師アダルバート、正義の戦いの前に祝福をお願いします」
languages.original_text: "Confessor Adalbert, I ask for your blessing before a righteous battle."

traits.locale_text: 「アダルバート牧師、正義の戦いの前に祝福をお願いします」

languages.text: "Konfessor Adalbert, ich bitte Euch vor einer rechtschaffenen Schlacht um Euren Segen."
languages.original_text: "Confessor Adalbert, I ask for your blessing before a righteous battle."

traits.locale_text: "Reverend Adalbert, ich bitte Euch vor einer rechtschaffenen Schlacht um Euren Segen."

languages.text: "Günah Çıkarıcı Adalbert, haklı savaşımızdan önce senden bir kutsama rica ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "Confessor Adalbert, I ask for your blessing before a righteous battle."
